section.audio_text: The MAX APU inlet door is no longer just opened or closed, it has three positions: ground or full open, in-flight or partially open, and closed. As a result, a DOOR light has replaced the MAINT light on the APU Control Panel. After time is allowed for door movement, the DOOR light illuminates when it is not in the commanded position. A new non-normal checklist has been added to the QRH for this alert.
